resources.string:
Hello! My name is Zheming. 

I love video games. 

I am really good at video games. 

I love drinking wines. 

The last time I got drunk is when I was 20. 

I come from China. 

I am good at cooking, I could make a lot of dishes. 

Last time when I was in German, I drunk a lot of beer. 


 Feels tired, I want to go to sleep right now 

zzzzzzzzzzzzz
